revision.text:
'''Fraglimit''' is a [[cvar]] available for deathmatch games, which sets the max amount of [[frag]]s that can be achieved by a player. If set, the game will end after the ''fraglimit'' is reached by a player.
To include a frag limit (in command line parameters):
'''+fraglimit (frags)''' *''frags'': is the number of maximum frags set by the host player. [[Category:Glossary]]
